All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
DiscountedModification
 
DiscountedModificationGroup
 
HelperMethods
 
Main
 
Modification
Represents a modification in the tree structure with associated costs and priority.
ModificationBinaryTree
A thread-safe custom binary tree that stores ModificationGroup objects with customizable sorting logic.
ModificationBinaryTree.Node
A static nested class, this represents a Node in the binary tree, the basis of the tree structure.
ModificationBinaryTreeInterface
Defines a thread-safe binary tree that stores ModificationGroup objects with customizable sorting logic.
ModificationBinaryTreeInterface.Node
Nested interface representing a node in the binary tree structure.
ModificationBinaryTreeOperations
Provides all the needed operations for working with the binary tree ModificationBinaryTree, which consist Modifications and Modificationgroups.
ModificationBinaryTreeOperationsInterface
Defines operations for working with a binary tree structure containing modifications and modification groups.
ModificationGroup
Represents a modification group in the tree structure with a list of Modifications , unlike a Modification it does not have a TypeOfModification value.
TreeElement
 
TreeLogic
 
TypeOfModification
